name: The Keep
description: Explore the subterranean depths in this first-person dungeon crawler with real-time combat, a unique rune magic system, exploration, and puzzle solving. This game will awaken memories of what made old-school dungeons so much fun to play while you fight, hunt for hidden treasures, and avoid deadly traps.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Single Core 1.6 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card supporting DirectX with 256 MB of memory Storage: 480 MB available space Sound Card: A compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Single Core 1.6 GHz Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card supporting DirectX with 512 GB of memory Storage: 480 MB available space Sound Card: A compatible sound card
